title: Valentine’s Vintage Matchmaker Bazaar
description: A vintage bazaar at Grand Bazaar NYC, featuring various vendors and activities.
address: 100 W 77th St at Columbus Ave, Upper West Side

title: Echoes of the Heart: A Valentine’s Market
description: A market featuring local vendors at TV Eye in Ridgewood.

title: Film for Good Presents: Moonstruck with H. Pruz
description: A screening of the film 'Moonstruck' at Purgatory in Bushwick.

title: Cupid’s Undie Run Fundraiser
description: A fun run fundraiser at The DL in the Lower East Side, with the run starting at 1:30 pm.

title: Saturday Afternoon Cartoons: Lots of Love
description: A special screening of cartoons at Metrograph in the Lower East Side.

title: Dark Sexy Valentine’s Pop-Up Market
description: A pop-up market featuring various vendors at Caffeine Underground in Bushwick.

title: 8 Ball Community’s Third Annual Valentine’s Day Zine Fair
description: A zine fair at the Sixth Street Community Center in the East Village.
address: Sixth Street Community Center, East Village

title: The Black Parade: Bloody Valentine Emo Ball
description: An emo-themed dance party at The Brooklyn Monarch in East Williamsburg.

title: Bad Romance: A Gaga Valentines
description: A Valentine's-themed event featuring music by Lady Gaga at 9 Bob Nonte, hosted at 3 Dollar Bill in East Williamsburg.

title: The Year of Flaco Exhibition
description: An exhibition at the New York Historical Society paying tribute to Flaco, the Eurasian eagle-owl.
address: New York Historical Society, Upper West Side

title: Wild at Heart: Willem Dafoe Retrospective
description: A retrospective of Willem Dafoe's films at Anthology Film Archives in the East Village.

title: Fifth Annual Winter Madness at Our Wicked Lady
description: A music competition featuring 16 bands at Our Wicked Lady in Bushwick.

title: Stranger Things: The First Shadow Box Office Opening Event
description: A box office opening event for the Broadway-bound play 'Stranger Things' at the Marriott Marquis Theatre.

title: First Friday at Poster House
description: Enjoy free admission and special programming at Poster House in Flatiron.

title: Immigrant Jam Comedy
description: A stand-up comedy show featuring immigrant and first-generation comedians at Caveat in the Lower East Side.

title: Buster Keaton x R.E.M.: A Silents Synced Film
description: A screening of Buster Keaton's 'Sherlock Jr.' paired with R.E.M.'s albums at Village East by Angelika and Cinema Village.
address: Village East by Angelika and Cinema Village

title: The Parlor Reading Series
description: An interdisciplinary reading series at The Brooklyn Artery in Flatbush/Ditmas Park.

title: Bitches Brew Comedy Show
description: A women-produced and hosted comedy show at Halyards in Gowanus.
cost: Free admission (tip jar will be passed around)

title: Support Women DJs One-Year Anniversary
description: A dance party celebrating the one-year anniversary of Support Women DJs at The Sultan Room in Bushwick.
